"Supplying Rockbear Meat":
"Personally, I like my meat nice and
tender. However, a lot of your friends
in the ARKS have been asking for a meat
that's tough. I hear there's a creature
called a Rockbear? I wonder if their meat
does justice to their namesake. I can't
believe anyone would want to eat
something like that though. Who knows,
maybe this will make me famous.
